Detailed Description

This package contains logging logic (including the Logger class), and related constants.

Function Documentation

def logger.fatal (   entries  ) 

Print an error to the screen, wait a bit, then exit the program.

Call this function when unrecoverable errors have occurred.

Variable Documentation

int logger.errorMessageDelayTime = 10000

Time in milliseconds to wait after displaying a fatal error, before exiting the program.

dictionary logger.logStrings

Initial value:

{
    LOG_DEBUG : 'DEBUG',
    LOG_INFORM : 'INFO',
    LOG_WARN : 'WARNING',
    LOG_ERROR : 'ERROR',
    LOG_FATAL : 'FATAL',
}
Different log levels.

Descriptor strings for the log levels
